Posts.Content: Feb 23, 2008 09:07PM Gus wrote: Deb, I have two words for you, darlin'....baseball hat! PLEASE post a picture. I'd like to add it to my collection of other embarassing photos that I have of you! LOL Love ya!! Sue
Posts.Title: OK....How about a laugh at my expense.... AlaskaDeb footprintsangel

Posts.Content: Jan 31, 2009 10:16AM Gus wrote: I am sitting here with tears in my eyes after watching the news story about Deb.  As I was watching the piece, the part with Deb's laughter came on, and from another room, my husband yelled, "Hey, I know that sound! It's Deb!"  My husband and I were so lucky to have met Deb at Pinkstock 2007, and I treasure the time that I was able to spend with her that weekend.   John, Katie and Carol, I pray that your wonderful memories of Deb give you comfort and bring you peace in the days ahead.  She loved you all, and her face would light up whenever she spoke of you.  My heartfelt prayers are with you today. Sue
Posts.Title: Alaska Deb is our newest Angel. Traci-----TripNeg 4753

Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2009 08:02PM Gus wrote: My heart is broken.  I am so fortunate to have had the opportunity to meet Deb at Pinkstock 2007. I will never forget her wonderful sense of humor or her uncanny ability to know just the right thing to say to comfort me when I needed it most.  My life is richer because of her friendship. Rest in peace, dear friend.  Bugs and fishes. Sue
